name: Quadsplosion Madness
description:
Get ready to explode! Quadsplosion Madness is an arcade game made for the minijam 73

The Android build has the controls mapped for the Retroid Pocket 2. Give it a try!

You can also play with a Game Pad

Square / Q - Place Bomb

Cross / Space - Jump

D-Pad / Arrow Keys - movement

Options / Enter - Start and Pause game

Have fun and let's see how far can you get!

Limitation for this jam edition was "Power", so keep a close eye to your Energy meeter, as placing bombs requires some of that "power"

Follow me on twitter!
